scripts.//: the option [watch] is a boolean, existence means watch
scripts.build: browserify --extension=.jsx -t [ babelify --comments=false --compact =true --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/entry.jsx | uglifyjs -cm > js/script.js
scripts.watch: watchify --extension=.jsx -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/entry.jsx -o js/script.js -dv
